title: Inoyu Apache Unomi
description: An MCP server for integrating Claude Desktop with Apache Unomi, enabling user context management through profile lookup, creation, and updates.
creator: sergehuber

UNOMI_BASE_URL.description: Base URL of your Apache Unomi server.

UNOMI_USERNAME.description: Username for authentication with Apache Unomi.

UNOMI_PASSWORD.description: Password for authentication with Apache Unomi.

UNOMI_PROFILE_ID.description: Profile ID for identifying user profiles in Apache Unomi.

UNOMI_KEY.description: Authorization key for interactions with protected Unomi events.

UNOMI_EMAIL.description: Email address of the user for profile lookup or creation.

UNOMI_SOURCE_ID.description: Source ID for identifying the tool (e.g., Claude Desktop) that is interacting with Unomi.
